item.description:
Liberty Day at the state house: February 21st 2013
---
A GUN Ban to OPPOSE, A study cmte to oppose:
Constitutional Carry to SUPPORT as well as other bills

CRIMINAL JUSTICE AND PUBLIC SAFETY CMTE, Representatives Hall

OPPOSE:
10:00 a.m. HB 290-FN, prohibiting unlicensed persons from openly carrying a pistol or revolver in a public building.

SUPPORT
11:00 a.m. HB 609, relative to possession of a firearm on school property.

SUPPORT
1:00 p.m. HB 451-FN, repealing the license requirement for carrying a concealed pistol or revolver.

OPPOSE
2:00 p.m. HB 396, establishing a committee to study requiring safety training or instruction prior to the purchase or acquisition of a firearm.
---

SUPPORT Also a chance to attend the NDAA NULLIFICATION hearing HB399 10:00am in LOB203
Please add this to your calendar and show up!

For those that have not been to the NH State House, this is the perfect occasion.

A chance to witness activism first hand with a group of like minded friends while helping us defend against our reps taking away more of our rights as well as defending the ability to carry a firearm concealed.
Be part of the process, join us this day!
PS. Get a chance to meet some of the most liberty oriented state reps in the country.
item.name: Defend our Liberty Day at the NH state house
